Heather Stephens https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heather_Stephens 0 Heather Stephens is an American actress. She starred on ABC's The Forgotten as Lindsey Drake alongside Christian Slater. Heather_Stephens is an_American_actress . She starred on ABC 's_The Forgotten as Lindsey_Drake alongside Christian_Slater .
